description:
You enjoy winter activity more when you're not freezing. These cold-weather tights use thermo-regulating fabric to hold in the warmth and keep you cool and dry during high-output stints. Movement-mirroring stretch and a gusset crotch let you move freely up the trail and around the track.

  • ActiveTemp fleece regulates temperature for warmth without overheating
  • Fabric has UPF 33 sun protection
  • Crotch gusset ensures unrestricted movement
  • Wide waistband and high-rise provide a secure fit and extra coverage
name: Outdoor Research Melody 7/8 Leggings Plus - Women's
